name: autofictional
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and Supabase backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.packages:build: cd packages/runtime && npm run build && cd ../cli && npm run build
scripts.packages:dev: cd packages/runtime && npm run dev & cd ../cli && npm run dev
scripts.packages:unlink: cd packages/runtime && npm unlink -g && cd ../cli && npm unlink -g
